name: Devtoolinvestors
tagline: List of early stage investors that have invested in developer companies
body:
### About 
A list of early stage dev tool investors based off information on Crunchbase and AngelList. Includes people who asked to be added, excludes people who asked not be on here. 

####Ullas Naik ([Crunchbase](https://www.crunchbase.com/person/ullas-naik#/entity), [AngelList](https://angel.co/ullas-naik), [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/ullasnaik)
**Type**: Angel  
**Location**: San Francisco  
**Dev Tool Companies Invested In**: Authy, Runscope, Bitnami, Amiato, BladeLogic, BlockCypher, CloudVolumes, PubNub, Rescale, Skymind, Trigger.io, Keen, Citus Data, Runscope

**Total Number of Investments**: 101
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
